title: The holy longing: or, The saints desire to be with Christ: delivered in a sermon at Al-hallows Lumbard-street, Aug. 24. 1658. At the funeral of Mr. Jacob Stock. / By Thomas Watson minister of Stephens Walbrook in the city of London.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: Printed by E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the sign of the Bible in Corn-hill, near the Royal Exchange.,
